title: Oceanic Vendor Marketplace
description: A premium, visually stunning e-commerce vendor marketplace template with a modern, polished look.
generation_hints: Implement infinite scroll with useInfiniteQuery for product listings
Use optimistic UI updates for cart and wishlist actions
Add next/image for all product and vendor images
Implement skeleton loaders for masonry grid layout
Use proper loading states during data fetch
Add input validation for price ranges and filters
Implement filter/sort state with URL params for shareability
Use Intl.NumberFormat for currency formatting
Add ARIA labels for all interactive controls
Implement keyboard navigation for product cards
Use semantic HTML for product listings (article, section)
Add proper error boundaries for component failures
Implement toast notifications for cart actions
Use ScrollArea for vendor list in filters
Add visual feedback for favorite/cart actions
Implement proper empty states for no results
Use masonry grid layout with proper responsive breakpoints
Add vendor verification indicators
Implement rating display with star icons
Use proper z-index management for modals and dropdowns
